attributes.title: Universal Gamma Scaling: Unified Information-Density Theory (UIDT v3.5.6) - Canonical Framework
attributes.description:
‚ö†Ô∏è CANONICAL REFERENCE (v3.5.6) - Supersedes v3.2/v3.3/v3.4/v3.5.

ABSTRACT:
Version 3.5.6 presents the definitive, non-perturbative framework for the unification of QFT and General Relativity via Information Geometry. This revision integrates 2025 DESI DR2 and JWST CCHP data within a 'Three-Pillar Architecture', providing a parameter-free derivation of the Yang-Mills mass gap and a 99-step hierarchical suppression mechanism for the vacuum energy.

CORE DERIVED CONSTANTS (IMMUTABLE):
This project establishes the following values as the primary source of truth for the UIDT framework:
‚Ä¢ Yang-Mills Mass Gap (Œî): 1.710 ¬± 0.015 GeV
‚Ä¢ Universal Gamma Invariant (Œ≥): 16.339
‚Ä¢ Holographic Length (Œª): 0.66 nm (fixed via DESI)
‚Ä¢ Hubble Constant (H0): 70.4 km/s/Mpc

EVIDENCE STATUS:
Claims are strictly classified (Category A: Mathematical Proof to Category D: Experimental Prediction) to ensure scientific integrity.
